document_data.name: Vindara Tzuntzin
document_data.mainbody: '''Vindara Tzuntzin''' was a [[half-elf]] tavern owner inhabiting the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She was slim and carried herself with grace. Vindara was sarcastic and was quick to spurn suitors.
document_data.Activities: Vindara, along with her sister [[Allet Tzuntzin|Allet]], owned a popular tavern in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] called [[the Misty Beard]]. She dreamed of founding a half-elf community in the [[Ardeep Forest]].
document_data.Possesions: She was a skilled [[wizard]] who enjoyed wielding a variety of [[wand]]s including a ''[[wand of fear]]'', ''[[wand of fire]]'', ''[[wand of flame extinguishing]]'', ''[[wand of illusion]]'', ''[[wand of lightning]]'', ''[[wand of paralyzation]]'', and a ''[[wand of polymorphing]]''.
document_data.History: She once ran the [[Black Gryphon]] [[inn]] in [[Elturel]] but wore out their welcome with their exotic employees and decided to try their hand in the City of Splendors.
